title: What is considered a Loss Prevented  game?
body:
I just had a player run up mid as {{champion:61}}, feed first blood to enemies mid before minions spawn, then afk at level 1. I was in the last game of my series to Gold 2 and was devastated. Just wondering what is considered a loss prevented match, or if this can be changed to a loss prevented? My entire team was bummed, me especially. The game ended in 12 minutes. 12. 

What are the requirements to receive a loss prevented game?

Can we get a Loss Prevented for this game? Or is this one of those things were if another player trolls, the entire team goes down with him and we all get "punished" for his actions? 

I understand winning and losing as a team, but when someone ejects themselves from the game like that in a ranked game it is really irritating. 

Anyways, just knew that the boards would be a good place to start as Player Feedback is mostly handled here. 

Would greatly appreciate a Riot response.

replies.body: [**Loss Prevention**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753014) is a button we can hit that will essentially erase any penalties/losses in MMR/LP/etc for games that were affected by server-wide or major system crashes. Loss Prevented isn't a tool that we activate for bad games here and there sadly.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=E2YAEgNY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-30T02:42:55.318+0000)
>
> [**Loss Prevention**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753014) is a button we can hit that will essentially erase any penalties/losses in MMR/LP/etc for games that were affected by server-wide or major system crashes. Loss Prevented isn't a tool that we activate for bad games here and there sadly.

Will uploading a replay (in a ticket of course)  help in getting the player responsible punished? I hate using the word punished, as it feels pretty intense for a game, but it really sucks that this happened, for everyone involved. I love this game to the core, but some of the people I get on my team, and sometimes the enemy team, do not share the same love for the game and the people who play it that I (generally speaking) have.   

Also, thank you for the super fast response. IT IS SO VERY MUCH  APPRECIATED!!!!!!!!

The best thing to do to get our attention for those situations is to report them in the post-game lobby. That will send us a ping that we might need to look into what's been happening. With that being said, if you couldn't report for some reason go ahead and shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with that video and we might be able to help out.
